previewArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps 0, Montreal Impact 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A key match between Canadian foes kicks off resumption of Major League Soccer regular season play after the World Cup break as Vancouver Whitecaps FC play host to the Montreal Impact at BC Place.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Vancouver Whitecaps FC vs Montreal Impact | June 25, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact).
Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Jennifer C
timelineItems.text: Game time!!! Speed hopefully does some serious damage tonight. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Carlyle Mitchell.
Foul by Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact).
Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: #IMFC have had the brighter start, though no overall fireworks of action yet. Not a surprise considering long lay-offs both clubs just had.

timelineItems.name: JF Tancrede
timelineItems.text: Bon c'est pas avec Tissot qu'on va améliorer nos tir sur coup franc!!! #imfc

timelineItems.name: LucasDP
timelineItems.text: Where was he aiming, At the sky? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: not a great start for Tissot - awful free kick and yellow card trying to slow down Manneh - all in opening 10 mins. #VWFC #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Offside, Montreal Impact. Jack McInerney tries a through ball, but Matteo Ferrari is caught offside.
timelineItems.title: OFFSIDE: Matteo Ferrari is ruled offside, denying a golden opportunity

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Johnny Leveron (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Offside, Montreal Impact. Maxim Tissot tries a through ball, but Matteo Ferrari is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: Tissot une chance de marquer, un circuit , 2 corners et un jaune . T'es trop jeune pour des espresso #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Patrice Bernier.

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Where's the goal line technology on that one? #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Très bon coup franc de Tissot. But refusé...

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Good delivery from Tissot on the set piece. Mcinerney comes close, but is flagged for offside. Right call. #IMFC #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).
Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Abdou Sall
timelineItems.text: #IMFC joue un bon début de match! Ben impliqué dans les actions offensives. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Soccer Talk
timelineItems.text: "Man that's sick" - Overheard in the stands when @Etado19's newest @barberandco cut was shown on the video board #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Matías Laba.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: ...and we're off again in the 2014 @MLS season... Roof open at @bcplace on a gorgeous, sunny evening in Van City! #VANvMTL

timelineItems.name: Franco Falbo
timelineItems.text: I hope none bites anybody in this game... #imfc vs #whitecaps

timelineItems.name: Guillaume
timelineItems.text: J'espère que le nouveau 33 va être meilleur que l'ancien 33 #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Issey Nakajima-Farran (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Darren Mattocks blisters a shot just wide

timelineItems.name: Mike Kennedy
timelineItems.text: #WhitecapsFC. Who's the last placed team here ?

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 0, Montreal Impact 0.

timelineItems.name: Christian Araos
timelineItems.text: So none of us would mind a repeat of #VANvMTL for the #USMNT tomorrow, right?

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Quand même un beau match nul pour #IMFC Un point bien mérité sur la route

timelineItems.name: Laurence morin-émond
timelineItems.text: Proud of you guys. Important point. See you Sunday ! #IMFC ❤⚽

timelineItems.name: Jacob Noseworthy
timelineItems.text: Poor performance by @WhitecapsFC tonight, barely deserving the single point. Need a better effort this weekend. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.desc: A key match between Canadian foes kicks off resumption of Major League Soccer regular season play after the World Cup break as Vancouver Whitecaps FC play host to the Montreal Impact at BC Place.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Vancouver Whitecaps FC vs Montreal Impact | June 25, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Gershon Koffie.

timelineItems.name: Chris Golden
timelineItems.text: Leveron seems to still have the habit he picked up a few matches back of aimlessly playing the ball where ever. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Ça devient une habitude. #IMFC fait le jeu, mais se fait plomber par une contre-attaque. On l'avait dit qu'ils étaient rapides.

timelineItems.name: Mark Rogers
timelineItems.text: #VWFC off to a very sluggish start. Rust? Funny how two weeks of World Cup can raise expectations.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Jack McInerney beats the defense but puts his effort wide

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Though he looks a bit uncomfortable at times, Mitchell has done well to cover #IMFC's runs in behind the 'Caps backline. #VANvMTL

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps seem to be honouring Italian Heritage Night by playing like Italy against Uruguay.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Hassoun Camara following a fast break.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Jack Mac looks a threat with his movement up front for #IMFC. So important he stays fit the rest of the season for the Impact. #VANvMTL

timelineItems.name: Paul G
timelineItems.text: #vwfc #vancouverwhitecaps http://t.co/yBe7w0wBzW

timelineItems.name: Paul G
timelineItems.text: #vwfc #vancouverwhitecaps http://t.co/yBe7w0wBzW

timelineItems.name: Jared Book
timelineItems.text: What wasteful possessions by #IMFC. Holy moly. Passing to nowhere.

timelineItems.name: Kenny Price
timelineItems.text: What happened to the Jack Mac that would've buried that? #VANvMTL

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: #IMFC needs to score badly. Not often they have such control of the game... especially on the road.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).
Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Gershon Koffie.

timelineItems.name: Andy Seo
timelineItems.text: Despite all the #WorldCup excitement, I did miss watching a @MLS @WhitecapsFC game #vwfc

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: David Ousted twists to stop a deflected Tissot shot

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: Telling me that Tissot is the last midfielder left? Talk ab't lack of dept! #IMFC #imfclive #tsn690

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Darren Mattocks sends a longe range effort right at Perkins

timelineItems.comment: Gorka Larrea (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Benoit Normand
timelineItems.text: #Imfc Après 27 minutes de jeu aucun joueur n'a eu besoin d'une civière. C'est pas la Coupe du monde!

timelineItems.name: JF Dupont Viel
timelineItems.text: #IMFC ça fait deux match que je regardes Tissot jouer. Le gars créé de belles opportunités mais ne semble pas les concrétiser.

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: Surprised to see how lethargic #WhitecapsFC have been so far figured they'd have come out flying

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Matías Laba.

timelineItems.desc: Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Andres Romero clips Ousted on the head

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Gershon Koffie.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).
David Ousted (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Peu d'occasions en une demi-heure à #VANvMTL, mais Montréal fait mieux que tenir son adversaire en échec

timelineItems.name: yourlocalkat
timelineItems.text: Guess where? Go Whitecaps! #whitecapsfc

timelineItems.name: Joey Alfieri
timelineItems.text: Frank Klopas telling @PFrioletRDS that he wants his team to be much more confident with the ball. No forcing it into tight spaces #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Sévère comme carton sur Romero. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: What a nice pass by Tissot! #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Gorka Larrea tries a through ball, but Issey Nakajima-Farran is caught offside.
Hand ball by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: 50StarsSoccer
timelineItems.text: A Jack Mac goal could really go a long way to opening this game up. Whitecaps not at all attacking like usual #VANvMTL #IMFClive #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: NC
timelineItems.text: Ok. Le carton a Romero c'est aussi mérité que le Vézina a Rask. #justsayin #imfc

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Vancouver asleep. Impact haven't taken advantage. That's a concern. #IMFC #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Loredana Panza
timelineItems.text: Justin Mapp just injured or ??? #imfc

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: This game needs more bite to it. But no actual biting.... #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: BC Soccer Association
timelineItems.text: And were off! #vwfc go caps go!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: Not so much Catenaccio from the Whitecaps here as Catnappio. #ItalianHeritageNight

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Hand ball by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: #IMFC a souvent du mal à élever son jeu d'un cran en cours de match. Début de 2e mi-temps sera clé si le score persiste.

timelineItems.name: Ben Zayandehroudi
timelineItems.text: Bar now on the pitch !! #vwfc @WhitecapsFC best fan experience http://t.co/DPCK7qtHSM

timelineItems.name: PKG
timelineItems.text: Have a feeling Montreal Impact may regret not making their dominance count. #VANvMTL

timelineItems.name: Sylvain Bergeron
timelineItems.text: Bernier semble plus a l'aise sans Bernardelo #IMFC

timelineItems.name: MLS Canada
timelineItems.text: It's really been a slow start for both teams. Not surprising coming off the break. #IMFC #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Michael McColl
timelineItems.text: You can tell the Whitecaps players were watching a lot of World Cup games during their break. Sadly it was the ones with Greece and Russia.

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Jack Mack, plus à gauche… #2foisCeSoir #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Golden
timelineItems.text: Sloppy half with no pace. Guess the #WorldCup break took the energy out of the game. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: Goalkeeper David Ousted has been sharp so far for #WhitecapsFC.

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 0, Montreal Impact 0.

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Great half. Could be up by two or three. Need to finish. #IMFC #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Cam Tucker
timelineItems.text: Mercifully, that first half comes to an end. No score. Plenty of rust. Not much freedom, creativity in #WhitecapsFC through 45 minutes.

timelineItems.name: Andy Wild
timelineItems.text: Mitchell out of his league first half, Whitecaps look asleep, huge hole in the middle of the park, Ousted having a great game #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Impact de Montréal
timelineItems.text: Sur une échelle de 1 à 10, quelle est votre appréciation du jeu de l'Impact dans cette première demie sur la route? #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: We are 0-0 at the half. Who do you think is the key #VWFC player to open the scoring tonight?

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Vancouver Whitecaps 0, Montreal Impact 0.

Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Troy Perkins.

timelineItems.name: Richard Baldry
timelineItems.text: Three up front means nothing happening in midfield. Wide guys need to step back more. #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Stats show #IMFC were wasteful with their chances. In their predicament in the league, it's something they ill-afford to do. #VANvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Karl Ouimette.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps) because of an injury.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Armada
timelineItems.text: The post has saved us twice thus far. Saved us from losing to Montreal's B team. Their B team. Sell everyone to Al Arabi. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.text: Come on Gonzo!! Now would be the perfect time to have your first @MLS goal!! #IMFC #IMFClive #VANVMTL

timelineItems.name: Little MLS Blog
timelineItems.text: #VANvMTL may end up being the least exciting match of the week. (Unless you count the first half of ITAvsURU.)

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: Playing Manneh, Mattocks & Hurtado together may have been better away, you need more than raw pace to break down a deep backline. #VANvMTL

timelineItems.desc: Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Gershon Koffie goes high with the elbow

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 90+3': Neither side seems to be pressing for the win. No notable chances thus far in stoppage time.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gershon Koffie (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Wandrille Lefevre (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Alan Errington
timelineItems.text: What an awful game #vwfc I would rather watch a replay of England losing again. They will take the ball away in an Ambulance. Long Ball?

timelineItems.name: Toronto Gooner
timelineItems.text: Have to say Im impressed with #IMFC tonight. Very professional job away from home, especially against a pacey #VWFC attack
